p: G-CSF (Leucostim® Injection, Dong-A ST Co., Ltd., Seoul, Korea, nomenclature of component filgrastim) is regarded as an investigational medicinal product for this study. The dose and volume of G-CSF will be determined on the first day according to the body weight of each subject (Table 1). G-CSF will be subcutaneously administered 12 times (daily for 5 days, followed by every 3 days for 7 times). Normal saline (JW Pharmaceutical, Seoul, Korea) will be used as a placebo at a maximal volume of 1.2 mL.
